meanings.sent1: The magic trick completely mystifies me.
meanings.sent2: Her complex explanation mystifies most students.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to open doors mystifies everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The sudden disappearance of the ship mystifies the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins mystify visitors with their hidden secrets.

meanings.definition: To make mysterious or difficult to understand
meanings.sent1: The masked ball mystifies the guests with its secrecy.
meanings.sent2: The cryptic message mystifies codebreakers around the world.
meanings.sent3: The chef's new recipe mystifies even the most experienced cooks.
meanings.sent4: The foggy forest path mystifies travelers, leading them in circles.
meanings.sent5: The strange symbols on the ancient artifact mystify archaeologists.
